title: Ep. 531 ESPN Just Pushed America off the Stupid-Cliff!
description:
In this episode: Has the Left reached peak-stupid? You'll never believe what ESPN did. http://insider.foxnews.com/amp/article/57562   Here are two important takeaways from Trump's fiery speech last night. https://apnews.com/cb3d2c1548ca4e8e92f75d706a749f91/The-Latest:-Arizona-governor-greets-president-on-tarmac   Are we approaching a dangerous new era of Internet censorship? This Internet entrepreneur thinks so.  https://www.wsj.com/articles/was-i-right-to-pull-the-plug-on-a-nazi-website-1503440771   SPONSOR LINKS: www.BrickhouseNutrition.com/Dan www.CRTV.com  Promo Code "Bongino"
